text: Has anyone setup pagination with dynamic pages? My first time using hubdb and i'm trying to make a news and press section. I couldn't create a new blog because they don't want to use the same subdomain the blog is on for these press releases. I'm using a coded template so i can have different layouts for the main listing page vs the dynamic post pages. Would pagination code need to go inside the if statement that controls the listing vs dynamic pages?

Is it possible to use a checkbox value in a queryparam? I'm trying to only show checked values.. Current markup: `{% set queryparam = "&orderBy=popular=1&limit=5" %}` Screenshot of table below. Thank you
You'd want to do `&orderBy=popular` and if you wanted it opposite order you'd do `&orderBy=-popular` you don't need to specify the value
Thanks for speedy response! Worked perfectly.
I see some community articles about this. See if this helps <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Pagination-for-table-rows-of-hubDB/td-p/25343>
